Message:
The bright, cheerful voice booming
across the lab didn’t sound at all
like the cry of someone
in dire need of assistance.

But, just in case, I still whirled
around to check for myself.

“Ahhhh, these marshmallowy
cheeks of yours send me straight
to the pearly gates of heaven~!
I can just feel my world-weary
soul takin’ flight~!”

She rubbed her cheek against mine
while professing some nonsense
beyond my, or any rational
human being’s, comprehension.

I stood aghast at her
illogical-as-ever exclamations.

But, knowing that despite
her baffling behavior,
she was still the greatest
intellect this country had
ever known left an even worse
taste in my mouth.

“So, what do you want?
You’re interrupting my research.”

“I see you’re bein’
extra icy today~
Well, y’see, I just made
this new discovery—”

From there, she prattled off
about what she’d found,
but her explanation was almost
too difficult even for me to follow...

This girl is a genius in
the truest sense of the word.
Unlike me, who’s just
a complete failure...
